testsuite.name: orawls::weblogic weblogic remote install weblogic silent file

testcase.name:
orawls::weblogic weblogic remote install weblogic silent file should contain File[/install/weblogic_silent_install.xml] with content => "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <bea-installer> 
 <input-fields>
 <data-value name="BEAHOME" value="/opt/oracle/middleware11gR1" />
 </input-fields> 
</bea-installer>"
